mapper.select: SELECT post_id , post_name , post_content , thumbnail , create_dt , ur.user_id AS user_id , ur.user_name AS user_name , ur.photo AS photo FROM good_blog.tb_posts po, good_blog.tb_categorys ca, good_blog.tb_blogs bl, good_blog.tb_users ur WHERE po.category_id = ca.category_id AND ca.blog_id = bl.blog_id AND bl.user_id = ur.user_id order by po.create_dt desc limit ${limit}, 10
